GapFillInput.Instruction: Type the correct form of the verb in brackets in each gap.

Content.Question:
1 Carol missed seeing all her friends when she moved to Vancouver. (see)
2 The salesperson refused to give me a discount. (give)
3 Our teacher persuaded us to take extra pronunciation classes. (take)
4 I got bored with swimming so I stopped going to the pool at the weekends. (go)
5 It was so sunny I was glad I had remembered to pack the sun cream. (pack)
6 Have you considered moving to another country after university? (move)
7 I really regret saying all those things about you, I was in a bad mood that day. (say)
8 The course involved spending a lot of time in the computer room. (spend)
9 I've tried to open the lid but it just won't move. (open)
10 The doctor advised him to reduce the amount of sugar and salt in his diet. (reduce)
